about_the_game:
Welcome to the apocalyptic universe of "Meg Infinity" - a revolutionary virtual reality action game that combines the challenges of an escape game with the intensity and thrills of a zombie VR shooter. Immerse yourself in the heart of the action with Nemesis, an intervention team led by Commander Victor "GHOST" Karamazov. Since the enemy attack, radio silence prevails, and your mission is crucial: save the besieged space base on the planet Megarthrus.

Cooperative VR Action: Play solo or join forces in coop with up to 10 players, depending on the game modes.

Critical Mission on Megarthrus:
Infiltrate the mining station, survive the zombies, ensure its safety, evacuate the survivors, and take absolute control of The Source.

Immersive VR Gameplay:
Dive into a thrilling VR experience, combining the adrenaline of a zombie FPS with the captivating mechanics of an escape game.

Solo and Coop Campaign:
Explore the levels of Megarthrus, where every choice matters. Play solo or cooperate with friends for an unforgettable gaming experience.

Diverse Game Modes:
Settle squad disputes in Team Death Match and Free for All modes. Survive zombie waves in Horde mode. All modes are available in solo and multiplayer.

Unique Heroes:
Choose from a variety of heroes, each with unique skills and weapons. Adapt your strategy to your preferred playing style and decide who to embody to face the unknown.

Distinct Skills and Weapons:
Each Nemesis member has unique skills and weapons. Choose wisely to maximize your efficiency on the battlefield.

Be ready to anticipate threats, act with speed and precision, as the survival of the space base depends on you. Are you ready to face the unknown?

content_descriptors.notes: This game is situated within a zombie invasion scenario featuring monstrous aliens and various other mutated creatures. It includes depictions of violence, graphic content, horror elements, mature language, and is not recommended for players under 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • VR Support: Steam VR, Valve Index, HTC Vive ou Vive Pro, HTC Cosmos, Oculus Rift, Oculus Rift S et les casques Windows Mixed Reality
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7500 / Ryzen 7 1600 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • VR Support: Steam VR, Valve Index, HTC Vive ou Vive Pro, HTC Cosmos, Oculus Rift, Oculus Rift S et les casques Windows Mixed Reality
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required
